author: Happiest_man😁
text: Good God, we trust  you have blessed us with wealth , peace and a beautiful future already.  Lord, please help us bring the contents of our jotters to reality. In Jesus name we’ve asked . Amen. 🙏🏼 #HAPPIESTHOUSEHOLD🇳🇬 🔥🌍

author: Happiest_man😁
text: All credit to Tuchel for making something delicious from Lampard’s ingredient. Plus now I see clearly what Lampard was seeing when he bought young average players and dug our academy for goldshis plan wasn’t bad ,unfortunately he was a Moses.Thank You  Lampard 😩😘💙 @ChelseaFC
